items.label: White Vest
items.teaser: White Vest is a project for collecting, logging, emitting, and visualizing telemetry from a model rocket containing an inboard Raspberry Pi Zero with another Raspberry Pi receiving telemetry.

items.label: Reciplay
items.teaser: The best cookbook is the one curated by you. Reciplay makes that happen by saving and organizing all of the great recipes that you find on the web. All the recipes you love are at your fingertips with Reciplay.

items.label: Standard Notes Clipper
items.teaser: An open source browser add-on (Firefox and Chrome) that allows you to clip web pages to your Standard Notes account.

items.label: Dresser Top Dashboard
items.teaser: This is a project that displays a simple personal dashboard as an image.
